page.title: 01SOUTHPORT
page.content: Southport is a coastal resort in the North-West.It has many attractions like Lord Street (a famous shopping street),theatres,the gardens,parks and promenade.It has many activities for young people of the town eg.Y.M.C.A. sports centre,the swimming pools,the fair,the amusment arcades and the beach.Also in July a carnival takes place in which many churches and organisations participate. The Southport Flower Show is held every August and is famous throughout the country for its wonderful exhibits Many people come to Southport and to cope with this are many places where people can stay.You can stay in one of the many hotels eg The Prince of Wales and The Royal Clifton hotels or at one of the many bed and breakfast houses.
